item.description:
Just found this event and thought i would share it with everyone. Some of us are planning on going.

 

"In addition to co-creating and starring in "Dog Whisperer" on the National Geographic Channel, Millan hasco-authored three books: The New York Times #1 Bestseller Cesar’s Way, bestseller Be the Pack Leader, and Dog Whisperer with Cesar Millan: The Ultimate Episode Guide. His DVDs and CDs are top sellers as well. His appearances on "The Tonight Show," "Oprah," and other programs have made Millan an internationally acclaimed pop culture icon. Millan will touch upon his life experiences and teach the attendees at his live show how to apply his techniques in the training and rehabilitation of their own dogs."

 

http://www.ppacri.org/events/detail/the_dog_whisperer_cesar_millan
item.name: Cesar Milan at the Providence Performing Arts Center
